summary: This cable discusses the approach to a liaison asset (Tapy/Watson) and details a refusal to serve as an informant due to security concerns. It mentions potential work with someone enjoying close relations with a cultural attach√©. Instructions are given to delay further action until advised, and a request is made to identify a representative mentioned in a previous reference.
title: DIR CITE SALV 5229: WHDV CUBA CUBANDEF
recipient: DDP, WILSA 8, CI, Cilops, ciles, VE
